animes.name: Attack on Titan
animes.description: In a world where humanity resides within massive walled cities to protect themselves from giant humanoid creatures called Titans, a young boy named Eren Yeager vows to eradicate the Titans after witnessing the destruction of his hometown and the death of his mother.
bestMoments: Eren transforms into a Titan for the first time.
Levi's fight against the Beast Titan.
Armin sacrifices himself to save the team.

characters.name: Eren Yeager
characters.quality: Determined and vengeful, willing to go to any lengths to achieve freedom.

characters.name: Mikasa Ackerman
characters.quality: Loyal and protective, with unmatched combat skills.

characters.name: Armin Arlert
characters.quality: Intelligent and strategic, values peace and understanding.

characters.name: Levi Ackerman
characters.quality: Ruthless and efficient, known as humanity's strongest soldier.

characters.name: Erwin Smith
characters.quality: Charismatic leader, willing to make difficult decisions for the greater good.

animes.name: Chainsaw Man (Manga)
animes.description: Denji, a young man drowning in debt, merges with his pet devil Pochita to become the Chainsaw Man. He is recruited by the Public Safety Devil Hunters to fight against devils threatening humanity.
bestMoments: Denji's first transformation into Chainsaw Man.
Denji and Aki vs. the Katana Man.

characters.name: Denji
characters.quality: Reckless and simple-minded, driven by basic desires but with a strong sense of loyalty.

characters.name: Power
characters.quality: Chaotic and unpredictable, loves blood and violence but has a soft spot for Denji.

characters.name: Aki Hayakawa
characters.quality: Calm and composed, driven by a sense of justice and a desire for revenge.

characters.name: Makima
characters.quality: Mysterious and manipulative, has a hidden agenda and incredible power.

characters.name: Pochita
characters.quality: Loyal and self-sacrificing, embodies the pure form of Denji’s desires.

animes.name: Jujutsu Kaisen
animes.description: Yuji Itadori, a high school student with incredible physical abilities, becomes involved in the world of Jujutsu Sorcerers when he swallows a cursed object—a finger of Sukuna, the King of Curses. He must learn to control his newfound powers and fight against malevolent curses.
bestMoments: Gojo vs. Jogo demonstrating Gojo's immense power.
Yuji and Nobara vs. the Cursed Womb: Death Paintings.
Gojo’s unsealing and the Shibuya Incident.

characters.name: Yuji Itadori
characters.quality: Compassionate and strong-willed, determined to save others at any cost.

characters.name: Megumi Fushiguro
characters.quality: Stoic and serious, values justice and believes in saving people he deems worthy.

characters.name: Nobara Kugisaki
characters.quality: Bold and confident, loves her individuality and fights with a strong sense of self.

characters.name: Satoru Gojo
characters.quality: Extremely powerful and eccentric, values his students and fights for a better world.

characters.name: Sukuna
characters.quality: Malevolent and arrogant, sees humans as insignificant and enjoys causing chaos.

animes.name: Mob Psycho 100
animes.description: Shigeo Kageyama, known as Mob, is an average middle school boy with powerful psychic abilities. He tries to live a normal life while keeping his emotions in check, but as his suppressed feelings reach 100%, his psychic powers go out of control.
bestMoments: Mob vs. Teru in the school.
Reigen's surprising revelation during the Claw arc.
Mob's confrontation with the Claw leader.

characters.name: Shigeo Kageyama (Mob)
characters.quality: Reserved and kind-hearted, struggles with self-confidence but possesses immense psychic power.

characters.name: Reigen Arataka
characters.quality: Charismatic and resourceful, a con artist who genuinely cares for Mob.

characters.name: Ritsu Kageyama
characters.quality: Ambitious and competitive, admires and resents Mob's abilities.

characters.name: Teruki Hanazawa (Teru)
characters.quality: Arrogant and confident, learns humility after losing to Mob.

characters.name: Dimple
characters.quality: Trickster spirit, initially selfish but becomes a helpful ally to Mob.

animes.name: Berserk (upto Golden Age Arc)
animes.description: Guts, a lone mercenary with a tragic past, battles his way through a dark medieval world filled with demons, corrupt nobility, and his inner turmoil. He joins the Band of the Hawk, only to find himself caught in a horrific fate.
bestMoments: The Eclipse event and betrayal of the Band of the Hawk.

characters.name: Guts
characters.quality: Strong-willed and relentless, driven by revenge and the will to survive.

characters.name: Casca
characters.quality: Loyal and determined, struggles with her feelings for Guts and Griffith.

characters.name: Griffith
characters.quality: Charismatic and ambitious, willing to sacrifice anything for his dream.

characters.name: Skull Knight
characters.quality: Mysterious and wise, acts as a guide and protector.

characters.name: Judeau
characters.quality: Dedicated Band of the Falcon member with keen perception and self-awareness.

animes.name: Vinland Saga
animes.description: A young Viking warrior named Thorfinn seeks revenge against Askeladd, the man who killed his father. Along the way, he gets entangled in the politics and battles of the Viking age.

characters.name: Thorfinn
characters.quality: Driven and tenacious, he dedicates his life to avenging his father’s death.

characters.name: Askeladd
characters.quality: Cunning and ruthless, he commands a band of mercenaries and harbors a complex background.

characters.name: Thorkell
characters.quality: Brutal and enthusiastic in battle, he is both a formidable foe and an ally to Thorfinn.

characters.name: Canute
characters.quality: Initially timid, he evolves into a strong and decisive leader.

characters.name: Bjorn
characters.quality: Loyal to Askeladd, he is a fierce warrior who gains strength from consuming berserker mushrooms.

animes.name: Your Lie in April
animes.description: Kosei Arima, a piano prodigy, loses his ability to hear the sound of the piano after his mother's death. His world changes when he meets a spirited violinist named Kaori Miyazono, who helps him rediscover his love for music.
bestMoments: Kosei and Kaori's first performance together.
Kosei overcoming his trauma to play piano again.

characters.name: Kosei Arima
characters.quality: Talented but troubled, he struggles with the trauma of his past and learns to live and love again.

characters.name: Kaori Miyazono
characters.quality: Free-spirited and passionate, she brings color back into Kosei’s world with her music and lively personality.

characters.name: Tsubaki Sawabe
characters.quality: Kosei's childhood friend, who has complex feelings of friendship and love for him.

animes.name: Haikyuu!!
animes.description: Hinata Shoyo, inspired by a volleyball ace known as 'The Little Giant,' joins his high school volleyball team to pursue his dream of playing in nationals. Despite his short stature, he learns to excel with the help of his rival and teammate, Kageyama.
bestMoments: Hinata and Kageyama's first practice match.

characters.name: Shoyo Hinata
characters.quality: Energetic and determined, he overcomes obstacles with his unbreakable spirit and agility.

characters.name: Tobio Kageyama
characters.quality: A perfectionist setter with immense talent, he learns to trust his teammates and work as part of a team.

characters.name: Daichi Sawamura
characters.quality: The captain and backbone of Karasuno, he leads with strength and compassion.

characters.name: Kei Tsukishima
characters.quality: Cynical and analytical, he gradually finds his own passion for the game.

animes.name: A Silent Voice
animes.description: After bullying a deaf girl named Shoko Nishimiya in elementary school, Shoya Ishida is ostracized by his peers. Years later, he sets out to make amends and find redemption.
bestMoments: The firework festival and Shoko's attempted suicide.
The reconciliation between Shoya and Shoko.

characters.name: Shoya Ishida
characters.quality: Remorseful and introspective, he struggles to overcome his guilt and find forgiveness.

characters.name: Shoko Nishimiya
characters.quality: Kind and forgiving, she faces challenges with resilience and strives to connect with others despite her disability.

characters.name: Yuzuru Nishimiya
characters.quality: Protective of her sister, she is initially wary of Shoya but eventually comes to accept his friendship.

characters.name: Tomohiro Nagatsuka
characters.quality: Shoya’s new friend, loyal and supportive, he helps Shoya navigate his path to redemption.

animes.name: Death Note
animes.description: Light Yagami, a high school student, discovers a mysterious notebook that grants him the power to kill anyone whose name he writes in it. As he tries to create a utopia free of crime, he faces off against the genius detective L.
bestMoments: Light's first use of the Death Note.
The confrontation between Light and L.

characters.name: Light Yagami
characters.quality: Brilliant and ambitious, he becomes increasingly ruthless as he pursues his vision of a perfect world.

characters.name: L
characters.quality: Mysterious and highly intelligent, a master detective dedicated to uncovering Kira’s identity.

characters.name: Ryuk
characters.quality: A shinigami who enjoys watching the chaos unfold, he drops the Death Note into the human world out of boredom.
